ta.title: பாராளுமன்ற கவுன்சில் தொடங்குகிறது
body_lines: இதற்கிடையில், பஸ்கா தாக்குதலில் ஒத்திவைப்பதற்கான அமைதி இன்று விவாதத்தின் இரண்டாவது நாள்.
අදාළ විවාදය ඊයේ (24)  දිනයේ ආරම්භ වූ අතර එය හෙට (26) දිනයේත් පැවැත්වීමට නියමිතව තිබේ.

en.title: Parliamentary Council begins
body_lines: Meanwhile, the Peace on Adjourn on the Passover attack is the second day of the debate today.
The debate was launched yesterday (24) and will be held tomorrow (26).

summary_lines: The Parliamentary Council's Peace on Adjourn debate on the Passover attack, launched on the 24th, continues on the 25th, with a conclusion expected on the 26th.
